English: double seven festival, evening of seventh of lunar seventh month

d.f: `農曆~`七月~`七~`日夜~`晚~。`相傳~`天上~`牛郎織女~`於~`這~`晚~`相會~，`後世~`以此~`日~`為~`情人節~。`此~`日~`婦女~`往往~`會~`陳~`瓜果~、`穿~`七孔~`針~`在~`庭院~`中~`祭拜~，`以~`乞求~`巧藝~。`見~`南朝~`梁~．`宗~`懍~《`荊楚歲時記~．`七月~》。

Deutsch: Qixi Fest ( chin. Fest, „Die Nacht der Siebenen“, Abend des 7. Tages des 7. Mond-Monats  (S)
English: double seven festival, evening of seventh of lunar seventh month
Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid `牛郎織女~|`牛郎~织`女~ are allowed their annual meeting
